sections.description: Edunation is a Block based FSE (Full Site Editing) compatible WordPress theme made for Education Website, Training Center, Courses Hub, College, Academy, University, School, Kindergarten, etc. Modern, responsive, and elegant theme template for WordPress fullsite editing. Edunation is clean and modern designed with well crafted patterns. You can change almost every elements easily via admin panel. Created especially for school, university or college website but it is also multi purpose. The templates are built ready so you don't need to build it from scratch. We want to make your experience using WordPress fullsite editor more convenient.
